name: S1NGUL4RITY
description:
S1NGUL4R1TY is a game where you are a space engineer, trying to harvest as much energy as you can from a gravitational singularity, but, be careful, as the singularity emits a shockwave that destroy all your efforts and must be keeped in check!

Game made in 2 days (done in the weekend, as it's the only free time i have :D )  for JamDna 11  by : 

Programming/Graphic Design/ 3D Art : Andrea Di Bartolo

Sounds Effects : Daniel Romeros

Controls:

-Left click on the ui elements to select a buildable then  left click on the ground to place it

-Left click on the buildable when the countdown is finished to collect

-Hold right click and move the cursor to rotate the camera.

-If the wave expands too much you lose.

-if the wave hits an object, the object is destroyed and the wave restarts.

-Wave speed increases with time.

Criteria:

Shockwave - The game revolves entirely on dealing with an expanding wave that gets faster over time.
